title: Holiday Gift Guide – What to get your favorite Gravel Cyclist!
content:
Gravel, “grav grav”, groads…whatever it is your favorite cyclist calls it (and can’t stop talking about) because they love it and it’s the best thing to happen to road bikes in forever…you can still make it better for them. And since our obsession here at Bikerumor is the gear and components, here are our top

author: Tyler Benedict
